name: Combat Cars
overview: Heat seeking missiles, anti-auto mines, slippery sludge slicks. This ain't your usual drive around the block. This is the most action-packed arcade racing game ever to hit the highways. You'll need every awesome enhancement your prize money can buy to win on all 24 grueling tracks. Whether it's rocky mountains, congested urban sprawl, gutsy harbor drives or shifty sand beaches, in this game only the strong survive. And Sunday drivers get wasted. Choose one of 8 mean machines for maximum adrenaline racing on 24 killer courses. Make a run for it by yourself, go head-to-head against a buddy in split-screen, or join forces for roadway domination. Boost your performance with extra turbo-thrusts, mega tires, amped-up engines and wicked power-ups.
